text:
ONSITE Love Cars? Love working on very hard problems? Join AutoMosys. AutoMosys – London, UK | Automotive Analytics

We are an ambitious early stage startup working on problems that will have a significant effect on mobility and driving today and in the future.

There are many reasons not to join us: - Not enough salary - Really difficult technical problems to solve - Long hours etc.

Reasons to join us: We are building the “holy grail” of automotive analytics. We want to be the very best. Not second best. The very best – which is very very tough to do. A lot of sacrifices has been made and will be made.

We believe the car is the next frontier as cars evolve from hardware to software . Be a part of an ambitious team solving real problems that affects us all.

Jobs (Responsibility): We are looking for a senior android developer who ideally has automotive and startup experience.

Graduates are welcome too.

If this still sounds interesting – contact me bola@automosys.com
